title: Mammoth Cave National Park: Parks as Classrooms
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education     Parks as Classrooms               Parks As Classrooms            In-Classroom Programs  Teachers in the 10-county BRADD area surrounding the park can bring the wonders of Mammoth Cave into their classrooms with a visit from an education ranger.           Curriculum Materials  Mammoth Cave National Park's Environmental Education Program offers more than 60 lesson plans contained within five separate Curriculum Guides, covering a wide array of subject matter in the sciences, mathematics, the humanities and more –with specialized units on paleontology and fire. These resources are available to teachers as individual Lesson Plans or as integrated Curricula.           Field Trips   Bring your students to Mammoth Cave to be immersed in the beautiful, natural surroundings: both aboveground and below the surface during an extended classroom program.
